Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.ui.gui.JFXControllers

Class BoardGUIController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.ui.gui.JFXControllers.AbstractGUIController
it.polimi.ingsw.client.ui.gui.JFXControllers.BoardGUIController
All Implemented Interfaces:
UiControllerInterface, GameGUIControllerInterface
Direct Known Subclasses:
OtherBoardGUIController
public class BoardGUIController
extends AbstractGUIController
implements GameGUIControllerInterface
Handles the personal board screen
